title: 09/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
After a WILD finish on Monday Night Football, Colin praises Derek Carr for pulling off the win and what separates him from other quarterbacks in the league. He reacts to USC firing head coach Clay Helton and why it’s time to think outside the box when it comes to rebuilding the football program. He also unveils his Herd Hierarchy after week 1 of the NFL season. Plus, FOX NFL analyst and former USC QB Mark Sanchez joins the show to break down the rookie debuts in week 1 and what USC will do to replace Helton.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
